attributes.action: Start inquests of all IRA murders/bombings
attributes.background: To start inquest into all IRA murders and bombings

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We're not sure whether you mean new inquests for all such cases or inquests for cases where they have not already been held.

In any case we can't accept your petition without your full name.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the circumstances in which you would like inquests to be held.
